oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Zero Hausdorff dimension spectrum for the almost Mathieu operator
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Last, Yoram
Shamis, Mira
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematical Physics
Mathematics - Spectral Theory
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We study the almost Mathieu operator at critical coupling. We prove that there exists a dense $G_\delta$ set of frequencies for which the spectrum is of zero Hausdorff dimension.
Comment: v1: 24 pp. v2: 25 pp, corrected the statement of Theorem 3 and added explanations in the proof of Theorem 2
